content: सौरभ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (भी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [सुरभिरस्यास्ति अण्] Fragrant. --भं {@--1@} Fragrance, <ls>Bv. 1. 18</ls>, <ls n="Bv. 1.">121.</ls> {@--2@} Saffron.
सौरभी, सौरभेयी {@--1@} A cow. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of the daughter of the cow called {%Surabhi%}; तां सौरभेयीं सुरभिर्यशोभिः <ls>R. 2. 3.</ls>
